cells.data:
should断言库的常用使用
  • 类型判断
    • obj.should.type(should.Function, 'this should be a Function type')
  • 属性判断
    • obj.should.have.ownProperty('a')
    • obj.should.have.property('a')
    • obj.should.have.keys('a', 'b')
    • obj.should.have.keys(['a', 'b'])
  • 数值比较
    • obj.should.be.equal(n)
    • obj.should.be.NaN()
    • obj.should.not.be.NaN()
    • obj.should.be.Infinity()
    • obj.should.be.above(n)
    • obj.should.be.aboveOrEqual(n)
    • obj.should.be.below(n)
    • obj.should.be.belowOrEqual(n)
    • obj.should.be.approximately(value, delta)
    • obj.should.be.within(star, finish)
  • 字符串比较
    • obj.should.be.exactly(str)
    • obj.should.be.startWith(str)
    • obj.should.be.endWith(str)
    • obj.should.be.empty()
  • 数组比较
    • array.should.be.equal(arr)
    • array.should.be.containDeep(arr)
    • array.should.have.length(2)
  • 对象比较
  • 布尔比较
    • obj.should.be.ok()
    • obj.should.be.true()
    • obj.should.be.false()
  • 正则比较
    • obj.should.match()
    • obj.should.matchAny()
    • obj.should.matchEach()
